title: Macquarie on Paytm: No threat to business from RBI ban, small finance bank licence remains doubtful - Moneycontrol
content: Macquarie on Paytm: No threat to business from RBI ban, small finance bank licence remains doubtful  Moneycontrol
description: According to Macquarie, the recent developments substantially reduce Paytmâ€™s chances of upgrading to a small finance bank licence. The company is due to apply for the licence in May 2022
